medrxivr.Rmd
## 
## Attaching package: 'dplyr'

##     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

Download the most recent datadump

library(medrxivr)

mx_all_data <- mx_search("*")

Dataset description

The dataset contains 12 variables:

Variable Description
title Preprint title
abstract Preprint abstract
link Link to preprint webpage. Note, this only specifes the file path from the base medRxiv url (https://www.medrxiv.org), e.g “/content/10.1101/19012377v1?versioned=TRUE”. The “?versioned=TRUE” is required, as otherwise, the URL will resolve to the most recent version of the article (assuming there is >1 version available).
pdf Link to preprint PDF. At present, only the most recent version of the PDF is returned in mx_download()
date
subject
authors
bibtex
id
pdf_name
extraction_date
node

Contents
